column4: I would really like to get My ATI Drivers working, but everytime i enable andactivate them..... my system wont start back up, itll have me reconfigure Xorg, Any ideas on how i can get around this issue?
are you on 8.10 AND using fglrx?
then you cant do much. fglrx is STILL incompatible with 8.10's xorg 1.5! better try radeon or radeonhd as drivers
